message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking of a price more in the range of $100. Would you be willing to consider a lower price?
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand you're looking for a better price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $130.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still looking to save a bit more. Would you be willing to consider $115?
I understand you're looking to save a bit more, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell the product to you for $125.
I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $120?
